Venue Information FAQs Buy Tickets Behind The Scenes Peg Anderson, President of the Cultural Arts Association and Chairman of the Board This long awaited and much anticipated theater and event destination is poised to usher in a new
era for Downtown Boca. The Studio at Mizner Park will bring a year ‚Äòround calendar of fresh
and diverse programming to the area.
‚ÄúWe have come full circle, embracing the history of the venue as we look forward to an exciting,
inviting future.‚Äù Andrea Kline Board Member Andrea is an artist by nature and a graduate of the prestigious Parsons School of Design.

She is a connoisseur, creator, and collector of contemporary art, jewelry, and post-modern furniture. Additionally, she is a lifelong patron of the performing arts and artists from the symphony to opera and ballet to Beyonce.¬†¬†Andrea‚Äôs commitment to the community includes past service as a board member and officer of the Boca Raton Museum of Art. She currently serves on the Board of Directors of the Tri-County Animal Rescue. kenny greenblatt, Board Member tommy zeichman, Board Member Tommy Zeichman is a partner at Beighley, Myrick, Udell & Lynne, P.A. where his law practice focuses on commercial insolvency matters including related litigation and transactions. Tommy is a Palm Beach County native, resides in Boca Raton, and is the proud father of two daughters. As an active member of the community, Tommy serves as Chair for the FAU Alumni Board and previously served on Boca Raton‚Äôs Planning and Zoning Board. The Studio Theatre at Mizner Park ‚Äì Music. Comedy. Entertainment. Downtown Boca's Premiere Live Entertainment Venue! Venue Information FAQs Buy Tickets AWARD-WINNING entertainment IN Boca Raton Boca Raton‚Äôs premier entertainment destination is at the South End of Mizner Park. The Studio brings award-winning live theater, musicals, concerts, programming and expansive event space to Downtown. A 335-seat black box theater, 4,500 square foot event space and a gallery with full bar and entertainment, the possibilities are endless. What's Going On Oct 18, 2025 Comedian ‚Äî Andy Huggins ‚Äî One-Night-Only! The Studio, Mizner Park Boca Raton, Florida BUY TICKETS Jan 13 - 17, 2026 BIJOUX! Contemporary Jewelry Exhibition & Sale The Studio, Mizner Park Boca Raton, Florida BUY TICKETS Mar 20 - 21, 2026 The Bronx Wanderers 2026 The Studio, Mizner Park Boca Raton, Florida BUY TICKETS VIEW CALENDAR Our story There‚Äôs no place like this in Boca Raton. Rich in local history, The Studio brings together local and nationally recognized artists, performers, comedians, musicians and shows. The Studio is also a perfect place for you. With three different rooms to entertain and imagine, live shows, weddings, corporate parties, soir√©es, business meetings and more are possible. Take a look at what The Studio has to offer and who‚Äôs running the show behind the scenes. The Studio operates under the Mizner Park Cultural Arts Association, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to enriching the community through the arts. FAQs ‚Äì The Studio Theatre at Mizner Park Skip to content About Event Calendar CLASSES AND CAMPS ArtNEST x The Studio: Summer Camp! Venue Information FAQs Buy Tickets About Event Calendar CLASSES AND CAMPS ArtNEST x The Studio: Summer Camp! Venue Information FAQs Buy Tickets FAQs If you cannot find an answer you need below, please email us: info@thestudioatmiznerpark.com General Information What is The Studio at Mizner Park? The Studio at Mizner Park is an intimate live performance venue located in the heart of Downtown Boca Raton, Florida, hosting a variety of events, including concerts, comedy shows, and private gatherings. Where is The Studio at Mizner Park located? We are located in Downtown Boca ‚Äî Mizner Park (above Eddie V‚Äôs) Address: 201 Plaza Real, Boca Raton, FL 33432 [ Map ] What are the Box Office Hours? Monday ‚Äì Friday ‚Äî 10am ‚Äì 2pm Box Office also opens 2 hours before show time. What is our Phone Number? (954) 910-5826 (please leave a voicemail or email info@thestudioatmiznerpark.com ) What are the Age Restrictions? For an all-ages show, guests of all ages are welcome with an admission ticket. Children age 12 and under must be accompanied by an adult. Age restricted shows will be notated when purchasing tickets. Please review or inquire about any age restrictions prior to purchasing tickets. Parking & Transportation Where can I park for events at The Studio? There is parking available in the Mizner Park parking garages, located within walking distance of the venue. The closest parking garage is in the IPIC Theaters building, Garage B [ Map ] Is valet parking available? Yes, valet parking is available at Mizner Park for $20 per vehicle. What is the closest Brightline Train Station? Please use the Boca Raton Station . We are an 8 minute walk from the station. Are there rideshare or drop-off points? Rideshare (Uber/Lyft/Taxi) and drop-off points are conveniently located near the main entrance of Mizner Park. Dining & Pre-Event Options Where can I eat before or after the show? Mizner Park features several dining options, including fine dining, casual restaurants, and quick bites. Please visit the Mizner Park Directory for dining options ‚Äî https://www.miznerpark.com/en/directory/ Can I bring food or drinks into the venue? Outside food and beverages are not allowed inside The Studio. However, concessions are available during most events. Does The Studio have bar? Yes, our full liquor bar opens at door time and remains open throughout the show. Accessibility Is The Studio wheelchair accessible? The Studio is fully accessible, with ADA seating and restrooms available. How do I request accessible seating? Accessible seating can be requested at the time of ticket purchase or by contacting the venue directly. If you need assistance, please call (561) 203-3742 or email info@thestudioatmiznerpark.com Tickets & Entry How can I purchase tickets for events? Tickets can be purchased online through our website , at Ticketmaster.com , at the box office, or by calling our box office at (561) 203-3742. For Group Sales, please email info@thestudioatmiznerpark.com Please note: We cannot guarantee that tickets purchased on third party ticket sites such as Stubhub, VividSeats, EventTickets.com, etc. are legitimate. What time do doors open for events? Doors typically open one hour before the show starts. Please check your event details for specific times. Can I transfer or refund my tickets? Tickets are generally non-refundable, but can be transferred. For more information, check the refund policy for your specific event. To transfer your tickets to a friend, please visit your Ticketmaster account and select ‚ÄúTransfer Tickets.‚Äù Venue Policies What items are prohibited inside The Studio? Prohibited items include weapons, large bags, outside food and drink, professional cameras, and recording devices. Is there a dress code? While there is no formal dress code, guests are encouraged to dress appropriately for the event. Additional Information Can I host a private event at The Studio? Yes! The Studio is available for private rentals. Contact us for more details and availability. How do I stay informed about upcoming events? Join our email list or follow us on social media ( Facebook / Instagram ) for the latest announcements and updates. Is The Studio at nonprofit organization? Yes, The Studio at Mizner Park is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation, is governed by a board of directors . What is the theater capacity? Our black box theater has a capacity of 300 seats. We also have a 4,500 square foot event space and a gallery with full service bar where the possibilities are endless Be the first to know about special events and shows. Subscribe to our mailing list. BEN BANKAS LIVE üìç Show Date: Saturday, August 9th, 2025 ‚è∞ Doors: 6:30pm | Show: 7:30pm üéü Tickets On Sale Now! üé§ About Ben Bankas ‚Äî Ben Bankas is one of the most fearless, unapologetic comedians on the scene today, known for his edgy humor, razor-sharp wit, and viral comedy takes. His ability to push boundaries while making audiences burst into laughter has gained him a dedicated following across social media, podcasts, and live stand-up shows nationwide. With a unique perspective on life, culture, and current events, Ben‚Äôs stand-up is raw, unfiltered, and absolutely hilarious. Whether you‚Äôve seen his viral clips or heard his no-holds-barred takes online, now‚Äôs your chance to witness Ben Bankas LIVE for one night only in Boca Raton! Buckle up, Boca! Come Get Messy in Mizner! June to August 2025 9am to 1pm Summer Art Camp at The Studio at Mizner¬†Park! June through August 9-1pm Snacks Included, Parents Pack a Nut-Free Lunch Join us for an unforgettable camp of artistic exploration at The Studio! This unique art camp is designed to let kids creativity run wild! Get ready to embrace vibrant colors, painting, creative crafts and more. We provide the materials and the kids provide the creative process!
